name: post_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool socialgrep.
Tool description: Search Reddit comments and posts in near real time and view archive data from 2010 to present day
API description: Searches Reddit posts using given search query parameters via the Toolbench RapidAPI.

query.description:
The comma-separated query for the search. Supports the following term types:

`site:{site_name}` - search only posts where the domain matches {site_name}.

`-site:{site_name}` - search only posts where the domain does not match {site_name}.

`/r/{subreddit}` - search only posts from the subreddit {subreddit}.

`-/r/{subreddit}` - search only posts not from the subreddit {subreddit}.

`{term}` - search only posts with titles containing the term {term}.

`-{term}` - search only posts with titles not containin

after.description: The previous result's `sort_key` value. Used for pagination.
